rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with minimalistic design. The North-facing entrance adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring a welcoming and balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living area that merges Scandinavian simplicity with modern amenities; large windows enhance natural light. Careful placement of furniture ensures unobstructed flow and balance according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, featuring a sleek dining table and ample seating; designed for comfortable gatherings. North-facing window ensures balanced light and energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped with modern Scandinavian design elements including clean lines, neutral tones, and high functionality. Appliances are placed strategically in line with Vastu principles for efficient workflow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with natural light and privacy in mind; North-facing orientation is maintained to promote positive energy. Incorporates Scandinavian simplicity and comfort.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms (BHK)
rooms.description: Three additional bedrooms, each approximately equal in size to support multi-functional use. Designed with privacy considerations and Vastu principles ensuring a harmonious flow throughout the floor.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym area with essential exercise equipment, designed for both functionality and style. Features minimalistic Scandinavian design elements and is optimally located to ensure privacy while providing adequate ventilation.

openings.description: A grand, welcoming entrance in alignment with Vastu principles, ensuring energy balance and optimal entry light.
Large windows are strategically placed to maximize natural lighting while maintaining privacy. The north-facing windows enhance the Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic.
Balconies providing outdoor access and views, carefully integrated with the irregular plot design to maximize usable space.
